name: Noir Chronicles: City of Crime
description: Step into the shoes of Alfred Fox, a private eye with a knack for getting into trouble, and confront the danger looming over your old flame, Barbara Le Purr. Using your own intuition and wide investigation techniques you will follow the intrigue and face many, sometimes deadly, consequences.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Storage: 2 GB available space
